Welcome to our weekly update of grants and new funding options for European and UK tech startups!: European funding EIC Accelerator closing on March 13, 2024 – +€650 million for deep tech startups EIC Pathfinder Open closing on March 7, 2024 – €136 million for breakthrough technologies at low TRLs Innovation Fund closing on April 9, 2024 – €4 billion for decarbonisation technologies Eurostars closing on March 14, 2024 – +€100 million for international collaborative R&D projects Interoperability for border and maritime surveillance and situational awareness closing on November 20, 2024 – more than 29M€ to fund objectives identified by the Security Union Strategy, the New Pact on Migration and Asylum and the Strategy on the Schengen Area. Demonstrations of innovative floating wind concepts closing on January 21, 2025 – more than 138M€ to fund those activities targeting a sustainable, secure and competitive energy supply. Accelerating uptake through open proposals for advanced SME innovation closing on November 20, 2024 – more than 16.5M€ to fund Fighting Crime and Terrorism, Disaster-Resilient Society, Resilient Infrastructure, Border Management. UK funding IUK Smart grant closing on April 24, 2024 – 25M£ for game-changing and commercially viable R&D innovations JPIAMR: antimicrobial resistance (AMR) interventions closing on March 14, 2024– £16.5 million to support international collaborative research projects. Knowledge Asset Grant Fund: expand, spring 2024 closing on March 14, 2024– £15 million to support the exploitation of intangible assets that have a broader application or client base than their owner organisation. Eureka collaborative R&D: Eurostars 3 Call 6 closing on March 14, 2024– £2.5 million for collaborative research in partnership with organisations from participating Eurostars countries. Other interesting updates! Oxx – new VC fund with over €170M to help SaaS companies scale. NXTP – new VC fund worth $98 million to invest in B2B companies in pre-seed stage and seed-stage companies. Rainassance Ventures – new VC fund worth €20M to drive the growth of regional venture capital investment. Read the full article: https://lnkd.in/g8NY56JU #startups #funding #innovation #deeptech Programme Horizon Europe Innosuisse Oxx NXTP Ventures UKRI - Industrial Decarbonisation Challenge (IDC)

🌍 Exciting Opportunity Alert! Apply now for the Call for Solutions from our partners Global Entrepreneurship Centre (GEC) The GEC is dedicated to supporting transformative companies in the realm of sustainable technologies (sustech). Their focus is on achieving circularity, the global climate targets of the Paris Accord, and the Sustainable Development Goals set by the United Nations. 🌱 Calling All Innovators: Are you a tech startup addressing critical sustainability challenges? GEC is on the lookout for solutions in key sectors such as: 🌱 Building & Living 🌱 Textiles 🌱 Food & Agriculture 🌱 Energy 🌱 Mobility & Transport - for the first time ever This is your chance to be part of an evolving ecosystem for sustech startups and secure up to €200,000 to supercharge your scale-up journey. 🚀 Apply Today: Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity. The new Call for Solutions is now open for applications. Join them in driving innovation for a sustainable future. Remember, the application deadline is August 27, 2023. 👉 Apply now and be a trailblazer in the world of sustech! https://lnkd.in/eFkztMbp #GEC #sustainabletech #innovation #circulareconomy #climateaction #SDGs #startupopportunity #entrepreneurs #entrepreneurship #startups #founders #funding #scaleupyourbusiness #growth #venturecapital #vc #cvc #europe #tech #sustech #building #living #textiles #foodtech #agriculture #energy #mobility #transport

It’s said that challenges are the stepping stones to innovation. Sometimes the tougher the challenge, the greater the creativity. In my corporate days, I confess I would always argue my budget was never enough. If I had £100 to spend, I’d want £1,000. If I had £1,000 I’d need £10,000. Now, venturing into the world of book writing, I can have any size of marketing budget I want – after all, I’m in charge. But it turns out that I’m quite difficult to get approval from! In a world where paid campaigns dominate, the absence of a budget can initially feel like a setback. Without the luxury of financial resources, I find myself attempting to explore alternative avenues - tapping into the power of so-called organic reach. But who would have though crafting compelling content that resonates with audiences would be so difficult 😉 ? The attention span on social media can be a nano second! Research tells me that ‘It's about embracing the ethos of 'doing more with less' and finding creative ways to amplify your message without breaking the bank.’ Brilliant, that’s a great help. The research also tells me that ‘Selling something to your target audience and not blowing the budget is a journey that requires resilience, tenacity, and a willingness to embrace failure.’ I’m mastering that last one. So, I’d welcome any suggestions about marketing your own products on a no/low budget. Or you could be kind enough to like, comment and share. That helps a lot - thank you. And of course, this attempt at a thought-provoking post is in itself a thinly veiled and shameless plug for my new book, Eyes of Devilla. Out now on Amazon.

As a #founder or #startup team, are you interested in -Receiving up to € 200,000 to power your #scaleup journey (grant and convertible loan investment as in-kind services)? -Sharpening your sustainability and impact story to build a true responsible business and improve your investment readiness? -Joining a lifelong, collaborative community of likeminded startup founders & innovators? -Connecting with industry partners, investors, scientists, and experts globally? -Getting access to partner lab facilities, co-working space, and event space in Meerbusch / Düsseldorf, Germany? Then follow the Global Entrepreneurship Centre’s (GEC) Call For Solutions! The GEC supports transformative companies that focus on sustainable technologies (#sustech) in four main sectors: building & living, energy, textile, food & agriculture and mobility. Based in Germany, the GEC is a innovation hub and impact investor for scaling sustainable technology innovation and entrepreneurship. Learn more at https://lnkd.in/ea6iB6gy As one of the experts in this program I look forward to working with you in teams and individually to make sure #IntellectualProperty (IP) supports your business success. My support for you will focus on which IP, such as #patents, trademarks or trade secrets has the greatest impact for your business, what risks other companies’ IP can pose to your venture, and what practically to do about it. I call this #TheRightIP. So if your solution fits the profile: the application is open, what are you waiting for?

#DYK? 45% of organizations don't have a clearly defined digital marketing strategy. But those teams that do document their strategy are 313% more likely to report success than those who don't! Want to be a part of the winning team? Look no further! Allow us to become your trusted partners in success, propelling your company to new heights through our expert marketing solutions! No matter if you're a startup embarking on a new venture or an established business with 20 years of experience, our expertise can help you chart a course for success. Check us out here: #EthicalDigital #EthicalDigitalVideo #DigitalSociety #SocialMedia #SocialMediaTips #DigitalMarketing #MarketingTips #MarketingAgency
